page.title: 13FENWICK ARMS:Pub Landlady
page.content: Mrs Casson rises at 9.00am to let in the cleaners and to walk her dog before breakfasting. She cashes up the prev- ious night's takings and deposits them at the bank in Hornby.She shops locally for items she may have forgotten then helps in the pub if they are short- staffed.When the pub closes at 3.30pm she cashes up again,does housework,has tea and takes a bath.She works in the pub and restaurant from 6.00pm and does not go to bed before midnight.Running a pub is very tying and leaves little time for family life which Mrs Casson explained caused her marriage to break up.She feels she has neglected her daughter.Mrs Casson has been licensee of the Fenwick Arms for 6 years and is about to move to a bigger establish- ment.
